Description: Fired when a page is viewed.
Fired when a user clicks a contact link (Email, WhatsApp).
Trigger: Click on email or WA links in Footer/Header

Description: Fired when viewing content like social profiles.
Fired when a user clicks to book a global service (PayPal).
Parameters: item_name, value, currency ('USD'), market ('Global'), content_category, [User Properties]
Trigger: Click 'Book This' or 'Get Clarity Now' on Global service cards

Description: Fired when a user clicks to schedule a live global session.
Parameters: item_name, value, currency ('USD'), market ('Global'), content_category, [User Properties]
Trigger: Click 'Schedule Call' on Global service cards

Description: Fired when a user clicks to book an Indonesian service (Lynk/Form).
Parameters: item_name, value, currency ('IDR'), market ('ID'), content_category, [User Properties]
Trigger: Click booking buttons for ID services (New Year, Promo, Chat, Call via Lynk)

Description: Fired when a user clicks to schedule a session via Picktime (ID).
Parameters: item_name, value, currency ('IDR'), market ('ID'), content_category, [User Properties]
